1611250.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album Track 9 - Ghosts 'n Goblins - Graveyard
1611250.description:
A classic melody that's so good you'll be jumping around in your boxers! The ninth track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album, "Ghosts 'n Goblins - Graveyard" comes to Steam!

This catchy and ghoulish tune serves as the Stage 1 and Stage 2 theme for Ghosts 'n Goblins, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
